scripts.version: git checkout -B release/v$(npm run get:release:version) && gulp version && git add .
scripts.postversion: git push -u origin HEAD && git push --tags && npm run release
scripts.release: npm run release:create && npm run release:pullrequest && npm run latest && npm run clean:release:branch
scripts.release:create: gh release create v$(npm run get:release:version) -n "$(npm run get:release:notes)" $(npm run get:release:version:pre)
scripts.release:pullrequest: npm run release:pullrequest:create && npm run release:pullrequest:rebase && npm run release:pullrequest:view
scripts.release:pullrequest:create: gh pr create --title "Release/v$(npm run get:release:version)" --body "$(npm run get:release:notes)" --assignee $(npm run get:release:assignee) --base main
scripts.release:pullrequest:rebase: gh pr merge release/v$(npm run get:release:version) --auto --delete-branch --rebase
scripts.release:pullrequest:view: gh pr view release/v$(npm run get:release:version) --web
scripts.latest: npm run latest:main && npm run latest:develop && npm run latest:tags
scripts.latest:develop: git branch -D develop && git checkout -B develop && git push -u origin HEAD -f
scripts.clean:branches: git branch | grep -v "main\|develop" | xargs git branch -D
scripts.get:release:version:pre: MAJOR=$(npm run get:release:version | cut -c 1); if [ $MAJOR == 0 ]; then echo "-p"; fi
scripts.get:release:notes: sed -n "$(npm run get:release:notes:start),$(npm run get:release:notes:end)p" CHANGELOG.md
scripts.get:release:notes:start: START=$(grep -n "\[$(npm run get:release:version)\]" CHANGELOG.md | head -n 1 | cut -d: -f1); ((START=START+2)); echo $START
scripts.get:release:notes:end: END=$(grep -n "\[$(git tag | sed -n 'x;$p' | tr -d 'v')\]" CHANGELOG.md | head -n 1 | cut -d: -f1); ((END=END-2)); echo $END

hooks.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm test && sync-dotenv && git add .
